name: Dart Knight
description:
DISCLAIMER: This game is not finished. It is just a cool idea. It was only tested on Windows. Not on any other of the operating systems.

Controls
WASD to move,
Space to jump

Gameplay
In the war phase, try to kill as many enemies as you can and get StrengthYou can sell the Strength in the peace phase.

Twist: Strength determines your base stats so you are trading your base stats for projectile upgrades.
